tasks.task: Preparing and harvesting green onions for cultivation and fermentation into kimchi.
subtasks: Mixing nutrients into soil for seed cultivation.
Planting green onion seeds using specialized machinery.
Maintaining optimal temperature and humidity conditions for seed germination.
Watering the soil to keep it moist but preventing waterlogging.
Moving growing plants to a sunny area with controlled temperature.
Transitioning mature plants to hydroponic trays for further growth.
Using specialized machinery to trim excess roots during harvest.
Sorting and washing harvested green onions for processing.
Preparing the spice mixture for par kimchi.
Coating green onions with the par kimchi spice blend.
Fermenting the green onions in containers under controlled conditions.
Selecting high-quality seeds or cuttings for planting.
Planting date palm seeds/ cuttings in well-prepared nutrient-rich soil.
Irrigating the palm trees using drip systems.
Pollinating female date palms with collected pollen to ensure fruit production.
Using shaking machines to harvest ripe dates from the palms.
Cleaning dates by washing to remove dirt and debris.
Sorting dates by size, color, and quality.
Packaging dates using vacuum sealing or modified atmosphere packaging.
